Html:
Hi Radioman!

In my program I used an old version of GMap.NET and I could access Marker.LocalArea property without problems. (I use this for Drag & Drop operation).

With the new version, the LocalArea does not get updated anymore, only LocalAreaInControlSpace, which is internal. Could you please set it to public, so it is usable from another solution?

Thanks!
you use unstable version, you get unstable code ;}
